org.apache.shardingsphere.orchestration.center

接口 CenterRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.shardingsphere.spi.TypeBasedSPI
    所有已知子接口:
    ConfigCenterRepository, RegistryCenterRepository

    public interface CenterRepository
extends org.apache.shardingsphere.spi.TypeBasedSPI
    An interface for center to get/persist data.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close.
      String get(String key)
      Get data from config center.
      List<String> getChildrenKeys(String key)
      Get node's sub-nodes list.
      void init(CenterConfiguration config)
      Initialize config center.
      void persist(String key, String value)
      Persist data.
      void watch(String key, DataChangedEventListener dataChangedEventListener)
      Watch key or path of the config server.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.shardingsphere.spi.TypeBasedSPI

        getProperties, getType, setProperties

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        void init(CenterConfiguration config)
        Initialize config center.
        参数:
        config - config center configuration

      • get

        String get(String key)
        Get data from config center.

        Maybe use cache if existed.

        参数:
        key - key of data
        返回:
        value of data

      • persist

        void persist(String key,
             String value)
        Persist data.
        参数:
        key - key of data
        value - value of data

      • close

        void close()
        Close.

      • getChildrenKeys

        List<String> getChildrenKeys(String key)
        Get node's sub-nodes list.
        参数:
        key - key of data
        返回:
        sub-nodes name list

      • watch

        void watch(String key,
           DataChangedEventListener dataChangedEventListener)
        Watch key or path of the config server.
        参数:
        key - key of data
        dataChangedEventListener - data changed event listener
